name: 鍾孟雲
objective:
介紹電子零組件之組成，特性以及其應用，使學生具有實用電路之分析模擬與設計應用之能力，內容涵蓋：1. 半導体物理，2. 基本主動元件 (二極体，雙極性電晶体，場效電晶体)，3. 放大器電路，4. 邏輯 (數位) 電路，5. 積体電路。接續電子學 (上) 課程。
Introduce the composition, characteristics and applications of electronic components. Enable students to have the ability to analyze, simulate, design and apply practical circuits. The content covers: 1. Semiconductor physics, 2. Basic active components (diodes, bipolar transistors, field effect transistors), 3. Amplifier circuits, 4. Logic (digital) circuit, 5. Integrated circuit. Continue the class of Electronics I.
